testcase.classname: Choosing Departure and destination cities and finding flights
testcase.name: : FINDING FLIGHTS
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the the Welcome to simple Travel agency Landing page..........passed And I choose the "Boston" and "Rome" from the drop down.....................passed When I click on "<Find Flights>"............................................passed Then I should see "Boston" and "Rome" on the reserve page and 5 flight options.passed
